abilities.name: Death Burst.
abilities.description: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must then succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description: The mephit can innately cast sleep, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
